TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking option e.g. ae777a87-5ef3-4fa0-a4f0-d10e1f13073a

Name.description: The name of the tracking option e.g. Marketing, East (max length = 100)

Status.description: The status of a tracking option

TrackingCategoryID.description: Filter by a tracking category e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9
